description: The underlying cause of the installation failure and security vulnerabilities in Server 2016 and 2019 is the lack of timely patches for critical vulnerabilities, specifically pertaining to CVE-2024-20666. Microsoft has acknowledged that these operating systems are vulnerable but has not provided an automated patch release mechanism. As a result, administrators are required to manually download the latest Windows Safe OS Dynamic Update from the Microsoft Update Catalog and apply the necessary updates. This situation indicates a misalignment in patch management processes and the inability to automatically address security concerns, creating a notable risk for systems in production environments. For further details on addressing these vulnerabilities, reference KB-5034957, which outlines how to update the WinRE partition on deployed devices.
